projects.name: wanderer.moe
projects.description: A website which hosts hundreds of Genshin Impact assets. Averages over 30,000 individual users per month.

projects.name: roblox sound changer
projects.description: Windows program that allows you to easily modify your roblox 'death' sound. Also includes auto detection of game installation location for easier usage.

projects.name: roblox filter for discord
projects.description: A bot for discord which allows you to implement 'roblox-type' moderation to your discord server. Uses webhooks to mimic talking as the person.

projects.name: discord custom stream status
projects.description: An incredibly simple discord self-bot which allows for you to easily set your status to streaming & change the stream name & url to anything of your choice.

projects.name: dromzeh.dev
projects.description: The website you're currently seeing right now, created with SvelteKit and TailwindCSS and hosted with Cloudflare Pages. Previously hosted on Github Pages.
